item.title: Putting the tech in technical writer
item.description: I take the audience through a few ideas and examples (both personal and community sourced) for: Looking under the hood (of WYSIWYG tools), Learning just enough Git, Thinking in plain text, Templates, toolchain and processes, and Automation.
